about_the_game:
Percolator is a Roguelike Deckbuilder where you manage an up and coming cafe. Brew coffee and juggle a counter of items while scheduling tasks for your Baristas. Reinvest your profits to power up or build wealth. Discover new ways to combine ingredients so that your name goes down in history!

PLAN OUT BARISTA SCHEDULES

Cards cost Time. You have an unlimited amount of time each day, but your Customers grow more impatient as the day drags on. Do your best to balance making tasty coffee and keeping your customers satisfied.

BREW THE BEST DRINKS

Organize the items on your counter to take advantage of the special Traits of various items. Determine the best plan to maximize the value of every item, and discover powerful ways to brew the items together into something truly unique.

KEEP YOUR CUSTOMERS HAPPY

Every day brings new challenges... Your customers always have new demands and expect you to improve your game! Adapt your strategy to constantly changing orders and ensure that you get those five star ratings!

GO AFTER THOSE GAINS

Chase the dream of being a successful cafe. Carefully manage your profits and decide the best way to reinvest them. Power up your deck, purchase new equipment, or even dabble in the card market.
